segment.source: A list of steps to follow before you start to create your custom browser installation packages.
segment.target: A list of steps to follow before you start to create your custom browser installation packages.

segment.source: Before you start using IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Before you start using IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Go through this list, making sure you’ve answered all of the questions before you run Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) and the Customization Wizard.
segment.target: Go through this list, making sure you’ve answered all of the questions before you run Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) and the Customization Wizard.

segment.source: Have you determined which licensing version of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 to install?
segment.target: Have you determined which licensing version of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 to install?

segment.source: For info, see Determine the licensing version and features to use in IEAK 11.
segment.target: For info, see Determine the licensing version and features to use in IEAK 11.

segment.source: Do you meet the necessary hardware and software requirements?
segment.target: Do you meet the necessary hardware and software requirements?

segment.source: See Hardware and software requirements for IEAK 11.
segment.target: See Hardware and software requirements for IEAK 11.

segment.source: Have you gotten all of the URLs you’ll need so you can customize your Home, Search, and Support pages?
segment.target: Have you gotten all of the URLs you’ll need so you can customize your Home, Search, and Support pages?

segment.source: See Use the Important URLs - Home Page and Support page in the IEAK 11 Wizard.
segment.target: See Use the Important URLs - Home Page and Support page in the IEAK 11 Wizard.

segment.source: Have you reviewed the security features, determining how you want to set up and manage them?
segment.target: Have you reviewed the security features, determining how you want to set up and manage them?

segment.source: Have you created a test lab, where you can run the test version of your browser package to make sure it runs properly?
segment.target: Have you created a test lab, where you can run the test version of your browser package to make sure it runs properly?
